thread.title: Solazyme to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Financial Results on July 30, 2015
thread.title_full: Solazyme to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Financial Results on July 30, 2015

title: Solazyme to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Financial Results on July 30, 2015
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Jul 23, 2015, 21:53 BST - UK Markets closed Solazyme to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Financial Results on July 30, 2015 Press Release : Solazyme, Inc. – 7 minutes ago -0.09 
SOUTH SAN FRANCISCO, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
Solazyme, Inc. ( SZYM ), a renewable oil and ingredients company, today announced it will host a conference call and webcast on Thursday, July 30, 2015 at 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time to discuss its second quarter 2015 financial results. 
The call and webcast will follow the release of second quarter 2015 financial results after market close. A recorded version of the call will be available approximately two hours after the call at the Investor Relations portion of the company’s website, www.solazyme.com . 
Conference Call Details 
What: Solazyme’s second quarter 2015 financial results conference call and webcast 
Date: Thursday, July 30, 2015 
Time: 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time 
Live call: (877) 291-1287 
The webcast will be archived through August 6, 2015. 
About Solazyme, Inc. 
Solazyme, Inc. develops and sells high-performance oils and ingredients that are better for people and better for the planet. Starting with microalgae, the world's original oil producer, Solazyme creates innovative, sustainable, high-performance products. These include renewable oils and ingredients that serve as the foundation for healthier foods; high-performance industrial products; unique home and personal care solutions; and more sustainable fuels. Headquartered in South San Francisco, Solazyme's mission is to solve some of the world's biggest problems with one of the world's smallest and earliest life forms: microalgae. For additional information, please visit Solazyme's website at www.solazyme.com . 
Solazyme® and the Solazyme logo are trademarks of Solazyme, Inc.
